mapper.select: SELECT t.token_id, t.token, t.article_id, (t.frequency / doc_total.total_words) AS tf, LOG(#{totalDocs} / (1 + df_table.df)) AS idf, (t.frequency / doc_total.total_words) * LOG(#{totalDocs} / (1 + df_table.df)) AS tfidf FROM article_tokens t JOIN (SELECT article_id, SUM(frequency) AS total_words FROM article_tokens GROUP BY article_id) doc_total ON t.article_id = doc_total.article_id JOIN (SELECT token, COUNT(DISTINCT article_id) AS df FROM article_tokens GROUP BY token) df_table ON t.token = df_table.token
